data.prayer: Lord, for the leaders in the county of Mahoba, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Mahoba, Uttar Pradesh, India
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, we pray the believers are good spiritual stewards of their everyday relationships in Mahoba, Uttar Pradesh, India.
Spirit, teach the 9,636 believers that their old life is dead and their new life is hid with Christ.
data.verse: For you died, and your life is hidden with Christ in God.

data.prayer: Jesus, for those distressed and afraid in Mahoba, Uttar Pradesh, India, show them today that you give peace at all times and in every situation.
data.verse: Now may the Lord of peace himself give you peace at all times in all ways. The Lord be with you all.

data.prayer: Father, 0.0% are known to be believers. Please, Lord call more today.
Father, help your children in Mahoba, Uttar Pradesh, India find someone like the Samaritan Woman today. Someone who will open an entire town to your message of salvation.
data.verse: So the woman left her water jar and went away into town and said to the people, 29 “Come, see a man who told me all that I ever did. Can this be the Christ?” They went out of the town and were coming to him.

data.prayer: God in Heaven, only you can and should appoint evangelists. Please, appoint and send more to Mahoba, Uttar Pradesh, India.
data.verse: And in the church God has appointed first of all apostles, second prophets, third teachers, then workers of miracles, and those with gifts of healing, helping, administration, and various tongues.

data.prayer: Father, please give the people in the county of Mahoba access to a Bible in their own language.

location.name: Mahoba
location.people_groups_list: Brahmin Sanadhya, Brahmin Sawaria, Brahmin Rikhisur, Gadaria (Muslim traditions), Jat Dhariwal (Muslim traditions)
